text: Rice bread is a type of bread that is made from rice flour. It is a gluten- free option for people who are sensitive to it. ==Types== The Vietnamese banh mi (baguette) is made with rice flour and sometimes wheat flour. It has an airy and crispy texture. Liberian rice bread is a type of rice bread, made with rice flour, mashed ripe plantains, butter, eggs, baking soda, sugar, salt, water, and grated ginger. ==References== Category:Rice dishes Category:Breads
title: Rice bread
